TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit GacIdentityPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class GacIdentityPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于确保在全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中注册的调用方。This class is used to ensure that callers are registered in the global assembly cache (GAC). 声明是允许的范围取决于使用的值。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the value that is used. 声明的安全特性的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中的存储，以及在运行时访问系统。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全，请使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class, . > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保所有权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 以下示例演示了 的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of . [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CPP/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CS/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/VB/gacidentitypermissionattribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数调用基类，以验证值。The constructor calls the base class to validate the value. 此构造函数将相关联(例如， `Demand`) 与。This constructor associates a (for example, `Demand`) with the . 声明的安全特性的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中的存储，以及在运行时访问系统。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 使用的命令性安全。Use for imperative security. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将构造函数调用的程序存在于全局程序集缓存中的要求。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor to demand that the calling program be in the global assembly cache. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CPP/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CS/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/VB/gacidentitypermissionattribute.vb#2)]

Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 创建一个新的 对象。

span.span: A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永远不会由应用程序代码，应仅由安全系统中，调用此方法。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 此方法返回的权限从创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission returned by this method.
